short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide all posts about the presidential election on your Facebook timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Install this extension and any posts on your Facebook timeline about the election will be hidden.
You might see the post for an instant. Don't cry.
If the post doesn't use specific keywords on the blacklist, the post will still show up. Sorry.
